title: Create CLI Wrapper for All Scripts
description: Develop scripts/claude-cli.py as a unified command-line interface for all script operations. Single entry point for task management, validation, bootstrap, and analysis operations.
notes: Unified CLI using argparse or click. Commands: task, validate, bootstrap, analyze, metrics, checkpoint. Subcommands for specific operations. Help text and examples. Support for breakdown operations via CLI.
decision_rationale: Unified CLI improves user experience and makes scripts accessible to non-Python users. Single entry point simplifies documentation.
